inputs.name: Dimensions
inputs.description: Number of image dimensions

inputs.name: Input Images
inputs.description: Image pair (may be repeated)

inputs.name: Fixed Image
inputs.description: The fixed image

inputs.name: Moving Image
inputs.description: The moving image

inputs.name: Output
inputs.description: Output file (matrix in affine mode; image in deformable mode, metric computation mode; ignored in reslicing mode)

inputs.name: Affine
inputs.description: Perform affine registration and save to output (-o)

inputs.name: Brute Force Search
inputs.description: Perform a brute force search around each voxel

inputs.name: Moments of Inertia
inputs.description: Perform moments of inertia rigid alignment of given order (1 or 2)

inputs.name: Reslice
inputs.description: Reslice images instead of doing registration

inputs.name: Invert Warp
inputs.description: Invert previously computed warp

inputs.name: Input Warp
inputs.description: The input warp to be inverted

inputs.name: Output Warp
inputs.description: The filename for the inverted warp output

inputs.name: Root Warp
inputs.description: Convert 2^N-th root of a warp

inputs.name: Input Warp
inputs.description: The input warp

inputs.name: Output Warp
inputs.description: The filename for the root warp output

inputs.name: N
inputs.description: The value of N for 2^N-th root

output-files.name: Root Warp
output-files.description: The 2^N-th root of the input warp

inputs.name: Compute Jacobian
inputs.description: Compute the Jacobian determinant of the warp

inputs.name: Input Warp
inputs.description: The input warp

inputs.name: Output Jacobian
inputs.description: The filename for the Jacobian determinant output

output-files.name: Jacobian Determinant
output-files.description: The Jacobian determinant of the warp

inputs.name: Metric Computation Mode
inputs.description: Compute metric between images

inputs.name: Deformable Optimization Mode
inputs.description: Deformable optimization mode (experimental)

inputs.name: Weight
inputs.description: Weight of the next -i pair

inputs.name: Metric
inputs.description: Metric for the entire registration

inputs.name: Metric Type
inputs.description: Type of metric to use

inputs.name: Metric Parameter
inputs.description: Parameter for the metric (e.g., radius for NCC)

inputs.name: Step Size
inputs.description: Step size for optimization (default = 1.0), may also be specified per level (e.g. 0.3x0.1)

inputs.name: Iterations
inputs.description: Number of iterations per level of multi-res

inputs.name: Threads
inputs.description: Number of allowed concurrent threads

inputs.name: Fixed Image Mask
inputs.description: Fixed image mask (metric gradients computed only over the mask)

inputs.name: Generate Fixed Image Mask
inputs.description: Generate the fixed image mask by trimming the extent of the fixed image by given radius

inputs.name: Moving Image Mask
inputs.description: Moving image mask (pixels outside are excluded from metric computation)

inputs.name: Dilate WNCC Masks
inputs.description: Specifies that fixed and moving masks should be dilated by the radius of the WNCC metric during registration

inputs.name: Reference Image
inputs.description: Use supplied image, rather than fixed image to define the reference space

inputs.name: Reference Padding
inputs.description: Define the reference space by padding the fixed image by radius

inputs.name: Background Value
inputs.description: Value to fill missing values when mapping fixed and moving images to reference space

inputs.name: Input Transform
inputs.description: Specify transforms (matrices, warps) that map moving image to reference space

inputs.name: Zero Last Dimension
inputs.description: Sets sigmas and NCC radius to zero in the last dimension for 2D/3D registration

inputs.name: Time Step Mode
inputs.description: Time step behavior mode

inputs.name: Smoothing
inputs.description: Smoothing for the greedy update step (e.g., '1.732vox 0.7071vox')

inputs.name: Inverse Warp Output
inputs.description: Compute and write the inverse of the warp field

inputs.name: Root Warp Output
inputs.description: Compute and write the (2^N-th) root of the warp field

inputs.name: Warp Precision
inputs.description: Saved warp precision in voxels (default=0.1; 0 for no compression)

inputs.name: Noise
inputs.description: Standard deviation of white noise added to moving/fixed images when using NCC metric

inputs.name: Exponent
inputs.description: The exponent used for warp inversion, root computation, and in stationary velocity field mode

inputs.name: Stationary Velocity Field Mode
inputs.description: Perform registration using the stationary velocity model

inputs.name: Stationary Velocity Field Mode (SVLB)
inputs.description: Use more accurate but expensive update of v in stationary velocity field mode

inputs.name: Incompressibility Mode
inputs.description: Incompressibility mode, implements Mansi et al. 2011 iLogDemons

inputs.name: Initial Warp
inputs.description: Specifies the initial warp to start iteration from

inputs.name: Tetrahedral Mesh Regularization
inputs.description: Apply a regularization penalty based on the Jacobian of a tetrahedral mesh

inputs.name: Mesh
inputs.description: The tetrahedral mesh file

inputs.name: Weight
inputs.description: The weight of the penalty term

inputs.name: SVF Smoothness Regularization Weight
inputs.description: Weight of SVF smoothness regularization term (default: 1000)

inputs.name: Initial Affine Transform
inputs.description: Initial affine matrix for optimization

inputs.name: Nifti Header Affine initialization
inputs.description: Initialize affine matrix based on NIFTI headers

inputs.name: Voxel Grid Affine Initialization
inputs.description: Initialize affine matrix so that voxels with corresponding indices align

inputs.name: Image Centers Affine Initialization
inputs.description: Initialize affine matrix based on matching image centers

inputs.name: Image Side Affine Initialization
inputs.description: Initialize affine matrix based on matching center of one image side

inputs.name: Moments Affine Initialization
inputs.description: Initialize affine matrix based on matching moments of inertia

inputs.name: Affine Degrees of Freedom
inputs.description: Degrees of freedom for affine registration. 6=rigid, 7=similarity, 12=affine

inputs.name: Jitter
inputs.description: Jitter (in voxel units) applied to sample points (default: 0.5)

inputs.name: Random Search
inputs.description: Random search over rigid transforms before starting optimization

inputs.name: Number of Iterations
inputs.description: Number of iterations for random search

inputs.name: Rotation
inputs.description: Standard deviation of random rotation angle (degrees) or 'any' or 'flip'

inputs.name: Translation
inputs.description: Standard deviation of random offset in physical units

inputs.name: Force Determinant
inputs.description: Force the determinant of transform to be either 1 (no flip) or -1 (flip)

inputs.name: Assume Identity Covariance
inputs.description: Assume identity covariance (match centers and do flips only, no rotation)

inputs.name: Reslice Fixed Image
inputs.description: Fixed image for reslicing

inputs.name: Reslice Moving Image
inputs.description: Moving/output image pair for reslicing

inputs.name: Moving Image
inputs.description: The moving image to be resliced

inputs.name: Output Image
inputs.description: The filename for the resliced output image

inputs.name: Reslice Surface
inputs.description: Fixed/output surface pair (vertices are warped from fixed space to moving)

inputs.name: Input Mesh
inputs.description: The input mesh file

inputs.name: Output Mesh
inputs.description: The filename for the output warped mesh

inputs.name: Interpolation Mode
inputs.description: Interpolation for the next pair (NN, LINEAR*, LABEL sigma)

inputs.name: Reslice Background
inputs.description: Background (i.e. outside) intensity for the next pair (default 0)

inputs.name: Reslice Data Type
inputs.description: Data type for the next pair

inputs.name: Reslice Composite
inputs.description: Write composed transforms to outwarp

inputs.name: Reslice Jacobian
inputs.description: Write Jacobian determinant image to outjacobian

inputs.name: Reslice Simplex Jacobian
inputs.description: Compute Jacobian determinant for a simplex mesh in fixed space

inputs.name: Input Mesh
inputs.description: The input simplex mesh file

inputs.name: Output Mesh
inputs.description: The filename for the output mesh with Jacobian determinants

output-files.name: Jacobian Mesh
output-files.description: The output mesh with computed Jacobian determinants

inputs.name: Reslice Mask
inputs.description: A binary mask for the fixed image; zero values will be overwritten with background

inputs.name: Metric Gradient Output
inputs.description: Write the gradient of the metric to file

inputs.name: Debug Derivatives
inputs.description: Enable periodic checks of derivatives (debug)

inputs.name: Debug Derivative Epsilon
inputs.description: Epsilon for derivative debugging

inputs.name: Debug Affine Objective
inputs.description: Plot affine objective in neighborhood of -ia matrix

inputs.name: Dump Pyramid
inputs.description: Dump the image pyramid at the start of the registration

inputs.name: Dump Moving
inputs.description: Dump moving image at each iter

inputs.name: Dump Frequency
inputs.description: Dump frequency

inputs.name: Dump Prefix
inputs.description: Prefix for dump files (may be a path)

inputs.name: Use Powell's Method
inputs.description: Use Powell's method instead of LGBFS

inputs.name: Use Single Precision
inputs.description: Use single precision floating point (off by default)

inputs.name: Version
inputs.description: Print version info

inputs.name: Verbosity
inputs.description: Verbosity level (0: none, 1: default, 2: verbose)

output-files.name: Output File
output-files.description: Output file from affine or deformable registration
